document.full_text: top seed caroline wozniacki barely raised a sweat as she pummeled american wildcard sloane stephens 6-3 6-2 in the second round of the indian wells wta tournament on saturday.
document.title: wozniacki eases through, li and hantuchova out
lines_and_colors: top seed caroline wozniacki barely raised a sweat as she pummeled american wildcard sloane stephens 6-3 6-2 in the second round of the indian wells wta tournament on saturday.
